rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with open plan design and a large window for natural light, aligning with Vastu principles of energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen; designed for family gatherings while ensuring adequate ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ample storage and natural lighting, positioned according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with a private balcony for relaxation and fresh air, designed in keeping with local aesthetics.

rooms.name: Balcony (Living Room)
rooms.description: Balcony adjoining the living room to enhance outdoor living spaces.
